Posts.EditableText: I am playing quest games on mobile but even after saving I don’t see an option to reload the save, I have an iphone.
Posts.HTML: I am playing quest games on mobile but even after saving I don’t see an option to reload the save, I have an iphone.

Posts.EditableText:
Are you going to the game listing page? (The one with a green button that says "play")
You might have to refresh the page, but the 'play' button should be replaced by "Resume" and "Restart" if you have a saved game.
Note also that saves are stored in your account on the site, so you can only save if you are logged in.

Posts.EditableText: Thank you, I did just have to refresh the page. Somehow I never tried that.
